name: Royal Bricks
description:
In this game you will play the role of Kazimierz Wielki. People say that: "When he ascended Poland was wooden, when he left us, it was from stone". Travel through medieval Poland and build new forts to strengthen your country.

This game was made in a week for a Polski Gamedev Game Jam where the theme was "Poland in game".

Controls

AD / Right and Left Arrow - Move Right/Left

W//Up Arrow/ Space - Jump

When building:

Left Mouse - Build Blocks

Mouse Scroll/ 1,2 - Change between bricks and platforms

When fighting:
Hold Left Mouse Button and release - throw item at enemy

Mouse Scroll/ 1,2,3 - Change between bricks, platforms and apples

Other:

R - Restart Level

E - Give Potter/Lumberjack an apple

Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
